reviews.review: Never seen any of the Avengers before this, typical but good. Happy it didnâ€™t have the expected superhero ending, too

Terrific movie with tons of action - so much that you get overwhelmed with what's going on.  There are a couple of plot holes, but there's so much going on that you don't have time to think about them while watching the movie.  It's only afterwards that they start to appear.  This movie is obviously a setup to Avengers 4, so that takes a little away from the ending.  Overall a very entertaining movie with non-stop action that keeps you glued to your seat.  I can hardly wait for Avengers 4 - I expect it will be an even better movie than AIW.

This film was the worst thing to happen to superhero movies since Batman vs. Superman. With obvious plotholes that undermine the fundamental premise of the film, a completely unsympathetic villain who's given way too much screentime, mind-numbing action completely unaware of the concepts of scale and balance, and an ending so insulting to fans it's amazing it made it out of the first draft, this movie is sure to upset and confuse viewers of all ages. While the actors give overall very charismatic performances, any redeeming qualities their comedy brings is completely outweighed by each hero's individual, and collectively dumb decision to consistently not save the universe that any redeeming qualities of this film are rendered null.
fun action packed movie but wired ending.
If you're a marvel fan it's an obvious must see and by far the best outting to date.
This is the greatest movie ever, cant wait to watch it again all over the time.
Good movie but not as good as the hype and fans proclaim.

It would've gotten 5/5 if they explained the ending a tiny bit better, otherwise, this is an amazing movie. Take Thor from Ragnarok, Doctor Strange better used to his character, the Guardians from GotG 2, a few surprising deaths, & Civil War Avengers. That cast makes this movie.

An emotional travel around 10 years of making a cohesive universe , resulting into a explosive opening to the end of a superhero age in cinematography, well, Marvel puts a concept in the narrative what only are possible a few years ago in the comics, yes, i enjoyed a lot. Thank you very much.
I saw the movie in the opening week and i just was not interested in it again, (too much plot holes)
